channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Police: Armed man dies after being shot by Akron officer on Thanksgiving night
item.description: Authorities in Ohio say a police officer in Akron shot and killed an armed man after hearing gunshots on Thanksgiving night.

item.title: New Jersey is using buyouts and barriers to battle flooding
item.description: New Jersey is using a mix of buyouts and barriers to tackle flooding in two vulnerable locations. Officials this week announced funding to buy and demolish homes in flood-prone sections of Cranford.

item.title: Libraries are offering free health and wellness classes across the US
item.description: Libraries around across the U.S. are helping people get healthier. They offer fitness classes, food pantries, cooking classes, conversations about loneliness and mental health, and even blood pressure monitors that can be checked out just like books.
